data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Ocotepeque, Honduras, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ocotepeque, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ocotepeque, Honduras.

data.section_summary: On average, 28 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Ocotepeque, Honduras.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ocotepeque, Honduras.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ocotepeque, Honduras be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ocotepeque. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ocotepeque who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ocotepeque.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Ocotepeque
